house_listing.house_description: The gray hawk. A 2600 sq ft ranch under construction soon. Estimate delivery 2/2000. Brick front, crawl foundation, covered porch, 9 ft ceilings, gas heat, jetted tub, ge speed cook oven, crown moulding tray ceiling. Sodded front yard.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ranch Style, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
